Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    com.here.mobility.sdk.core.HereMobilitySdk
    This class provides static methods, which make it harder to test the SDK. Use MobilitySdk instead, that provides MobilitySdk.getInstance() and instance methods.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.here.mobility.sdk.demand.DemandClient.cancelRide(String, String)
    This field is deprecated, please use DemandClient.cancelRide(CancelRideRequest) instead.
    com.here.mobility.sdk.demand.RideLocation.getEstimatedDropOffTime()
    This field is deprecated, please use RideLocation.getEstimatedDropOffTimeSeconds() instead to avoid timezone differences issues.
    com.here.mobility.sdk.demand.RideOfferBase.getEstimatedDropOffTime()
    This field is deprecated, please use RideOfferBase.getEstimatedRideDurationSeconds() instead to avoid timezone differences issues.
    com.here.mobility.sdk.demand.RideOfferBase.getEstimatedDurationMs()
    This field is deprecated, please use RideOfferBase.getEstimatedRideDurationSeconds() instead to avoid timezone differences issues.
    com.here.mobility.sdk.demand.RideLocation.getEstimatedPickupTime()
    This field is deprecated, please use RideLocation.getEstimatedPickupTimeSeconds() instead to avoid timezone differences issues.
    com.here.mobility.sdk.demand.RideOfferBase.getEstimatedPickupTime()
    This field is deprecated, please use RideOfferBase.getEstimatedPickupTimeSeconds() instead to avoid timezone differences issues.
    com.here.mobility.sdk.core.HereMobilitySdk.getLoggingId()
    this class is deprecated, use MobilitySdk.getInstance().getLoggingId()
    com.here.mobility.sdk.core.HereMobilitySdk.getUserAuthInfo()
    this class is deprecated, use MobilitySdk.getInstance().getUserAuthInfo()
    com.here.mobility.sdk.core.HereMobilitySdk.getVersionName()
    this class is deprecated, use MobilitySdk.getInstance().getVersionName()
    com.here.mobility.sdk.core.HereMobilitySdk.init(Application)
    use MobilitySdk.init(android.app.Application) instead
    com.here.mobility.sdk.core.HereMobilitySdk.isHereAgentProcess()
    This class is deprecated, use MobilitySdk.getInstance().isHereAgentProcess() instead.
    com.here.mobility.sdk.core.HereMobilitySdk.isHereAgentProcess(Context)
    This class is deprecated, use MobilitySdk.getInstance().isHereAgentProcess() instead.
    com.here.mobility.sdk.core.HereMobilitySdk.isInitialized()
    this class is deprecated, use MobilitySdk.isInitialized()
    com.here.mobility.sdk.map.route.RoutingClient.newInstance(Context)
    Use RoutingClient.newInstance() instead.
    com.here.mobility.sdk.map.geocoding.GeocodingClient.newInstance(Context)
    Use GeocodingClient.newInstance() instead.
    com.here.mobility.sdk.demand.DemandClient.newInstance(Context)
    Use DemandClient.newInstance() instead.
    com.here.mobility.sdk.core.HereMobilitySdk.setUserAuthInfo(HereSdkUserAuthInfo)
    this class is deprecated, use MobilitySdk.getInstance().setUserAuthInfo(authInfo)
